display_name: Mother or children moved in with other people, even for a little while, because of inability afford to pay mortgage, rent or utility bills, during the last 12 months
description: During the last 12 months, did you or your children move in with other people even for a little while because you could not afford to pay your mortgage, rent or utility bills?
